timeline.bodyText: Bad name. Why if mention "single-switch"? It must be something like sendSwitchStatusUpdateNotification, the receiver can treat this notification in any required way.
timeline.author: surabujin

replies.bodyText: Agree, although there's a precedent with sending "flow reroute" request instead of "ISL status update" notification - just check the method above.
replies.author: sergii-iakovenko

timeline.bodyText: Incorrect pattern usage. Each make*Tuple method serve corresponding stream. These methods make abstraction over stream fields set, that's why they are bound to streams. So if you push message into reroute stream, you must use makeRerouteTuple(...).
timeline.author: surabujin
surabujin

timeline.bodyText: Why not a transaction over all flows not over each of them?
timeline.author: surabujin

replies.bodyText: Since we need to have consistent state within flow/flow_path, not all flow/flow_paths on the switch, and it also reduce time for each transaction
replies.author: timofei-durakov
